oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Surgeon's kit
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This surgeon's kit contains needles with a label that says "The Medical Supply Assn. LTD, 6 1.2 Holly Street, Sheffield" on one side and "Great Britain" on the other side. The kit also contains a misshapen minie ball, a misshapen round ball and a Maynard; carbine bullet with brass casing. The kit may date to slightly after the Civil War and was possibly a post-mortem kit or autopsy kit.
